lead_paragraph: The NFL will announce Thursday that the 2017 draft will be held in Philadelphia, a person with direct knowledge of the announcements tells The Associated Press.

headline.print_headline: AP Source: NFL to Announce That 2017 Draft Headed to Philly
headline.main: AP Source: NFL to Announce That 2017 Draft Headed to Philly
